categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: "Jenra," also known as "the Engineer," was a female individual who worked for the Galactic Empire on a secret project of theirs. After designing a deflector shield she realized the value of her creation and defected. Sometime later she auctioned off the shield generator, originally it was won by the Droid Gotra before it was returned to Jenra by Han, Qi'ra, and Tsuulo. It was re-auctioned, this time being won by the Kaldana Syndicate. She hated the Empire, and was also very rich. She treated other beings badly and only cared about money. Her ship was a yacht called the Red Nimbus.
